title: How to Make Cake Batter Cookies

steps.headline: Roll in granulated sugar.
steps.description: Placing the sugar in a pie plate gives a large contained surface to roll the cookie dough balls in. Alternatively, you can place the sugar in a baggie, drop the cookie dough balls in and five a quick shake.

steps.headline: Place on a cookie sheet.
steps.description: Please sure to leave room for the cookies to flatten and expand.

text: Preheat oven to 400 °F (204 °C).  Mix all ingredients (except sugar) together.  Form dough into small balls.  Roll in granulated sugar. Placing the sugar in a pie plate gives a large contained surface to roll the cookie dough balls in. Alternatively, you can place the sugar in a baggie, drop the cookie dough balls in and five a quick shake. Place on a cookie sheet. Please sure to leave room for the cookies to flatten and expand. Cook for 8-10 minutes.  Finished.
